abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Social Sectors
            Development Project are to improve the efficiency, delivery
            and management of social services in Jamaica, and in
            particular, of health and education. It will support the
            Government's Human Resources Development Program
            (HRDP). The project will finance: civil works, furniture,
            equipment (including vehicles)), pharmaceuticals, books,
            training, consultants' services, and incremental HDRP
            staff for: health sector development; education sector
            development; HDRP administration and monitoring.
